articles.title: Russia to invite Taliban to international talks in Moscow Oct 20 - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: MOSCOW: Russia will invite the Taliban to international talks on Afghanistan scheduled for October 20 in Moscow, the Kremlin's envoy to Afghanistan, Z.
articles.content: Russia to invite Taliban to international talks in Moscow Oct 20

articles.title: 6 pills a day: Kym Ng on her hyperthyroidism and feeling 'very scared' after relapse during Star Awards 2021 - AsiaOne

articles.title: A cure for Covid-19? Interest in ivermectin remains strong despite health warnings - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Despite warnings from experts, unsubstantiated beliefs that ivermectin can cure Covid-19 still hold strong. Forums, social media and chat groups are rife with anecdotes of how ivermectin — a prescription-only drug for treating parasite infestation…
